settings.heading: Legends don’t die — they get printed.

settings.title: For the Culture
settings.text: Inspired by the beats, the blocks, and the bars that built our world. Gear up in pieces that speak loud.

settings.title: Legend Energy
settings.text: Streetwear with a story. Each drop designed to honor icons — past, present, and next up.

settings.title: Set the Tone
settings.text: Stand out, stay real. From chill days to loud nights, GATEDGOAT keeps you ahead of the wave.

settings.heading: What's my size?
settings.row_content: You can find our measurement guide on the product page. Select the size you want and we will show you what body measurements it is tailored to.

settings.heading: How do I wash my gear?
settings.row_content: Machine wash cold, inside out, hang dry for best life.

settings.heading: How long do orders usually take to ship?
settings.row_content: As soon as you make a purchase, our fulfillment center immediately processes your order to get your gear delivered on time. Ground orders can take up to 3-4 business days to be packed and shipped. Once shipped, ground shipments can take as little as 4-5 business days to destinations within California and up to 5-10 business days to locations on the East Coast.

settings.heading: What is your return policy?
settings.row_content: We offer a 30-day return policy on most items. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, please contact our customer support team to initiate a return. Items must be returned in their original condition.
